game.name: Red Carpet Stars
game.description:
Wow! Your favorite couples Anna and Kristoff have got a chance to attend the event of Red Carpet and you have been appointed as the fashion designer. Is not exciting to guide these popular Disney characters on their unique fashion journey? Join Red Carpet Stars and be prepared to help these lovely personalities to attain the best looks for the biggest event of your life! Your princess is in hurry, so try to be very fast to complete the task.

They both are royal characters so their outfits should also be exclusive and fabulous. Begin with princess Anna first and then move to the prince Kristoff in this brand new girls game! Give your girl a long gown with pink or green colorwork and match her dress with sparkling jewelry! Do not forget to complete her look with a pair of suitable sandals! Mix and match all the outfit and accessory options until you create a final look in this html5 dressing game!

Once you are done with the dress-up part, you have to work on her make-up part to make her look awesome. Choose lovely contact lenses, lipstick, eyes shadow, and eyebrows for your look! Be careful and try to pay attention to the details in order to avoid mistakes! Do fast since Kristoff is waiting for your girl outside! Check out more girls dress-up games to polish your fashion designer abilities and let the world know that you have a good sense of style! All the best for happy gaming, no download required!
